PrecisGranting of a LEAVE OF ABSENCE to the Hon. Mr. Justice H. JAMES PUDDESTER, a Judge of the Trial Division of the Supreme Court of Newfoundland, from January 1, 1998 until March 31, 1998, because of ill-health.
